name: environment_scenario_scale_a_specific_application_deployed_in_a_cyoda_e
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to scale a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

parts.text: scale a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

I can scale an app — I just need a few details first.

Please provide:
- env_name (e.g., dev, staging, prod)
- app_name (your application name)
- deployment_name (the deployment within the app to scale)
- replicas (integer >= 0)

Once you provide those I'll run check_environment_exists() and proceed to scale the deployment.

[options-single-choice: Provide Environment & App Details, List Environments, Cancel]
